snippet: Current and former White House officials have been traveling to Israel to discuss Iran, threatening more sanctions and stressing that the United States is prepared to use force if diplomacy fails.
abstract: Current and former White House officials have been traveling to Israel to discuss Iran, threatening more sanctions and stressing that the United States is prepared to use force if diplomacy fails.
lead_paragraph: Current and former White House officials have been traveling to Israel to discuss Iran, threatening more sanctions and stressing that the United States is prepared to use force if diplomacy fails.

headline.seo: U.S. Continues to Assure Israel About Efforts on Iran
headline.main: U.S. Aides in Israel Give Assurances About Iran
headline.print_headline: U.S. Aides In Israel Give Assurances About Iran
